titleStmt.title: Florus Anglicus: or An exact history of England, from the raign of William the Conqueror to the death of the late King. / By Lambert Wood gent.
Florus Anglicus. English
titleStmt.author: Bos, Lambert van den, 1610-1698.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Simon Miller at the Starre in St Pauls Church-yard.,

notesStmt.note: Lambert Wood = Lambert van den Bos.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "nouemb: 1st"; the 7 in the imprint date has been crossed out and replaced with a "6".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
